item.title: Research
item.description: MULTIVERSE - Multiphysics inversion and uncertainty estimation (2024 - 2026) Your browser does not support the video tag. MULTIVERSE is a project that will develop methods and technologies for stochastic multiphysics inversion and uncertainty estimation for geophysical data, leveraging modern high-performance computing (HPC) and scientific machine learning (SciML). The project aims to revolutionize the resolution of geophysical challenges by advancing data extraction techniques. By integrating physics-based knowledge into machine learning, MULTIVERSE reduces reliance on large datasets and enables fast, reliable predictions for parameter inference, uncertainty estimation, and data integration, even with limited, noisy, and multiscale geophysical data.
